PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Gemini tracks, shares, and monitors your chats. Internxt protects it.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Gemini may be secure, but itâ€™s a nightmare for your privacy. Switch to Internxt AI for secure, private conversations that remain fully confidential and encrypted.

titles: Your chats can be seen by Google
Conversations are stored on Googleâ€™s servers
Gemini can access and share data with other apps
descriptions: Gemini may use your chat inputs to train and refine its AI models. Certain conversations can be reviewed by human staff, creating a risk that personal conversations may be seen by Google employees.
Gemini chats and related metadata are stored in your Google Account activity and retained by default for up to 18 months, limiting user control over stored data.
When connected to Gmail, Calendar, Messages, WhatsApp, or other Google services, Gemini may share relevant data across apps, increasing exposure of sensitive information.
By default, Gemini chats are not end-to-end encrypted, allowing Google to access and process conversations and potentially compromising confidentiality.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private Gemini alternative
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What Gemini demonstrates in security fails in terms of privacy. Get total security and encrypted chats with Internxt AI.

descriptions: Gemini stores, reviews, and uses your chats to improve its AI, and anonymized data may be shared across connected Google apps. With Internxt, chats remain completely private and never used for training.
Without end-to-end encryption, Gemini conversations remain readable by Google systems and employees, exposing confidential information to potential access or misuse.
Google Gemini collects chats, metadata, and usage information to improve its AI, expanding data collection through integrations and increasing privacy risks.

VersusSection.title: Internxt AI vs Gemini
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unrivaled privacy and security thanks to zero-knowledge, post-quantum encryption, giving you the best protection from cyberattacks.

freePlanCard.description: Use Internxt AI for free with private encrypted conversations

faq.question: Is Internxt AI a more secure and private Gemini alternative?
answer: Yes, Internxt encrypts all your chats and never stores your conversations. Gemini does not encrypt chats and may use them to train its AI.
Internxt also includes Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, and Mail to provide additional protection against hackers and data breaches.

faq.question: Is Internxt AI free to use?
answer: Yes, you can use Internxt AI for free without logging in or providing personal information or payment details.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Post-quantum encryption is designed to resist future quantum attacks, making it a more secure alternative to standard encryption.
Internxt uses this technology to protect your data and lifetime storage plans against future cybersecurity threats at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, and complies with GDPR and strict European privacy laws to protect your data.

faq.question: Is Gemini more expensive than Internxt?
answer: Internxt AI is free to use, and with your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, all plans are cheaper while offering secure cloud storage and a complete privacy suite.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you need assistance, contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from your Internxt account settings or purchase additional plans and your storage will stack automatically.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express), PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
